key_risks: Intense competition from established players like Illumina
Supply chain vulnerabilities due to global disruptions
Negative P/E ratio indicating financial losses
controversies: Criticism regarding the accuracy of nanopore sequencing
social_issues: Ethical concerns regarding health assessment and disease diagnosis
